items.name: Apple iPod touch 64GB (6th Generation - Latest Model), Assorted Colors
items.shortDescription: The Apple iPod Touch 64GB is loaded with features. It is the ideal solution for carrying your music collection in your pocket. The device comes in five stunning colors, giving you plenty of options to choose from. Listen to your favorite songs from Apple Music and iTunes. It also offers the ultimate mobile gaming experience for versatility. Take outstanding photos and videos with the new 8MP iSight camera and make video calls with the improved FaceTime HD camera. Use the Bluetooth iPod Touch to stay connected with messages and to use the most popular social networking apps. The 4" retina display provides a quality viewing experience. It offers 1080p HD video recording and up to 40 hours of audio playback. With a sleek design and the ability to play your favorite tunes with just the touch of a button, it is wonderful for users on-the-go. It is equipped with 802.11ac Wi-Fi for Internet availability and Bluetooth 4.1 for hands-free use.

items.name: Refurbished Apple iPod Touch 4th Gen 32GB WiFi 3.5"  LCD Digital Media MP3 Player MC544LLA
items.longDescription: The world's most popular portable gaming device is even more fun. Now available in black and white, iPod touch includes iOS 5 with over 200 new features, like iMessage, Notification Center, and Twitter integration. Send free, unlimited text messages over Wi-Fi with iMessage. Record HD video and make FaceTime calls. Visit the App Store to choose from over 500,000 apps. iPod touch also features iCloud, which stores your music, photos, apps, and more and wirelessly pushes them to all your devices.<br><br>Music. The DNA of iPod Touch.<br>Add songs and music videos to your iPod touch from iTunes on your computer. Your workouts, your cram sessions, your commute, your late-night dance party of one, your ever-present need to drown out the noise around you. It's your music that keeps you going. And you know what respects that? iPod touch.<br><br>Features:<ul class="noindent"><li>32 GB flash memory, Supports iOS6</li><li>Holds up to 14,000 songs in 128 Kbps AAC format, up to 80,000 iPod-viewable photos, up to 80 hours of video</li><li>3.5-inch widescreen Multi-Touch Retina display (960 x 640 resolution @ 326 pixels per inch)</li><li>Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n wireless LAN (802.11n 2.4GHz only)</li><li>Nike + iPod support built-in</li><li>Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR</li><li>Maps location-based service</li><li>Built-in speaker and microphone, front facing camera for FaceTime, HD Video camera, rechargeable lithium-ion battery</li><li>Music playback time: up to 40 hours when fully charged</li><li>Video playback time: up to 7 hours when fully charged<br><br>Package Includes:</li><li>Apple iPod Touch 32GB (4th Generation) - MC544LL/A</li><li>AC USB Power Adapter</li><li>USB Cable</li><li>Stereo Earbuds<br><br>NOTE: Professionally Refurbished to manufacturer specifications with hassle free 90-day warranty. Item is in Fair condition and has been rigorously tested for full functionality. It will show signs of use that include but not limited to scratches, scuffs, denting or dings. 3rd party accessories are included and comes in non-retail packaging.</li></ul>

items.name: Apple iPod nano 16GB, Assorted Colors
items.shortDescription: <p>The Apple iPod Nano comes in five stunning Assorted Colors. It is designed to provide hours of entertainment with maximum portability. This 16GB iPod nano has a clear multi-touch display that lets you see more of the things that you love. It has a built-in FM radio as well as support for Fitness Walk + Run and Nike+. This Bluetooth iPod nano provides up to 30 hours of audio playback. Plug in a pair of ear buds or headphones to enjoy your favorite song lists. It also provides access to your videos and your photos. It has plenty of storage space for all of your apps and media.<br></p>

items.name: Apple iPod shuffle 2GB, Assorted Colors
items.shortDescription: <p>Keep your favorite music close at hand with the iPod shuffle, made of sleek, polished aluminum and available in 5 stunning colors to suit anybody's style. With 2GB of memory and up to 15 hours of battery life, you can listen to hundreds of songs without recharging. Click the control pad on the front of the device to play or pause, or to skip forward or back with utmost ease. Never forget the name of a song with the VoiceOver feature, which tells you the song title or playlist name, and speaks 25 different languages, so you can hear song titles and artists in their native tongues or any language you choose. Sync multiple playlists, audiobooks and podcasts from your iTunes library for a versatile listening experience. Clip the iPod shuffle to your jacket or backpack for your morning commute, or attach to your athletic attire for a hassle-free workout with an amazing soundtrack.</p>
items.longDescription: <b>Apple iPod shuffle 2GB, Assorted Colors:</b><ul><li style="list-style: none"><b>Key Features:</b></li><li>Up to 15 hours audio playback</li><li>Built-in clip with clickable control pad</li><li>VoiceOver button</li></ul><br> <b>Legal</b> <div style="margin-left: 2em">iPod models are not available in all colors at all resellers.<br> Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles and may eventually need to be replaced. Battery life and number of charge cycles vary by use and settings. See www.apple.com/batteries for more information.<br> Available in selected languages.<br>TM and (C) 2015 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.</div>

items.name: Refurbished Apple iPod Nano 7th Generation 16GB Space Gray MKN52LL/A
items.shortDescription: *This item is REFURBISHED. iPod nano comes in 5 stunning colors and is designed to provide hours of entertainment with maximum portability. Its 2.5-inch Multi-Touch display lets you see more of the music, photos, and videos you love1. And it has built-in FM radio as well as support for Fitness Walk + Run and Nike+.
items.longDescription: *This item is REFURBISHED.<br>More Information<ul><li>16GB internal storage capacity offers lots of space for photos, videos, and music to keep you entertained when you're on the go</li><li>2.5-inch multi-touch display: Watch videos or view photos on the 240 x 432 resolution screen. Tap the screen to play music, pause it, rewind and fast forward</li><li>Thin, compact design offers maximum portability: the iPod nano is 5.4mm thin and weighs just 31g (1.1oz.)</li><li>Bluetooth 4.0 technology lets you pair the iPod nano with Bluetooth-enabled headphones or speakers to enjoy your tunes wirelessly</li><li>FM radio with Live Pause lets you listen to your favourite talk show, news radio or music station and Live Pause lets you tap to pause a song or show and then tap to continue</li><li>Built-in pedometer and Nike+ support track steps, distance, time, pace, and calories burned without needing a separate sensor</li><li>Accessibility features such as VoiceOver, Invert Colors, and Mono Audio make it easier for people with disabilities to navigate the iPod nano and enjoy their music, audiobooks, and more</li><li>Included Apple EarPods, in-ear headphones, make your music and entertainment sound incredible and fit comfortably in your ears</li><li>Built-in rechargeable lithium ion battery fully charges in about 3 hours, and offers up to 30 hours of audio playback and 3.5 hours of video</li><li>Compatible with Mac OS X v10.7.5 or later, Windows 7 or later, and iTunes 12.2 or later</li><li>iTunes lets you discover new music, TV shows, movies, podcasts, purchase songs, import your CD collection, create playlists and sync everything to the iPod nano</li></ul>

items.longDescription: *This item is REFURBISHED.<br><p><strong>More Information</strong></p><ul><li>16GB internal storage capacity offers lots of space for photos, videos, music, and apps</li><li>A8 chip delivers desktop-class performance so you get better response and vivid graphics in all of you favourite games and apps</li><li>4-inch multi-touch Retina display delivers HD-quality images and video in 1136x640 resolution</li><li>M8 motion coprocessor constantly measures physical motion, using advanced sensors, for accurate fitness tracking information and sends it to the Health app</li><li>8MP iSight camera with f/2.4 aperture delivers stunning stills and video and features 10fps burst mode, 120fps slo-mo, time-lapse video, and hi-res panorama</li><li>Integrated FaceTime HD camera with f/2.2 aperture features improved face detection, HDR, and exposure control</li><li>Built-in WiFi 802.11ac and Bluetooth 4.1 for convenient wireless connectivity keeps you in touch with friends and family through social media or up to date on the latest apps in the App Store</li><li>iOS 8 delivers a smooth, powerful mobile experience and comes with a host of brilliantly designed apps to make your life easier, including iMessage, FaceTime, and Safari</li><li>Included Apple EarPods, in-ear headphones, make your music and entertainment sound incredible and fit comfortably in your ears</li><li>Built-in rechargeable lithium ion battery fully charges in about 4 hours, and offers up to 40 hours of audio playback and 8 hours of video</li><li>Compatible with Mac OS X v10.7.5 or later, Windows 7 or later, and iTunes 12.2 or later</li></ul>
